item.description:
Wanted, Veterans and grateful citizens to join us for the Westerly-Pawcatuck Veterans Day parade this Saturday.


Please consider joining Rhode Island Oath Keepers on a beautiful fall morning as we show respect for our veterans.


We will proceed down Route 1 and stop at the World War I Monument for a brief ceremony and then continue marching into downtown Pawcatuck. The marchers will do an “Eyes Right” as we pass the MIA, POW and the WWII Memorial on the Pawcatuck side of bridge.  The main ceremony will be held inside the Westerly Armory.

Muster this Saturday November 10, at 8:30 a.m.
Pawcatuck Shopping Center
37 South Broad Street, Pawcatuck, CT 06379

(Room still available on our float for those that would rather not walk)

RSVP to this e-mail, on FaceBook, twitter, meet up.com, by phone or just show up on Saturday. (Bring friends and family)Rhode

Island Oath Keepers

Acting State Chapter President

Randy Swanson
401-952-5015
item.how_to_find_us: The Rhode Island Oath Keepers Parade Float
item.name: Wanted, Veterans and grateful citizens to join us for the Westerly-Pawcatuck Vet
